name: Furniture_of_America_Daimon_Industrial_Medium_Oak_Writing_Desk
reviews: I bought this desk for my son. It's great! He loves it and so do I.
Love the desk. We got it for our office.
description: A simple utilitarian design for a no-fuss and updated working space, this industrial inspired desk is a smart choice. The mixture of metal and wood creates an easy and straightforward structure that will keep you focused on the task at hand.
